narratives.summaryHourly: The average pay for a Technology Manager is $25.47 per hour.
narratives.summarySalary: The average pay for a Technology Manager is $104,354 per year.

tasks: Oversee and maintain the installation and utilization of software and equipment.
Determine the appropriate computer systems and technology solutions to satisfy business needs.
May develop and review code, as well as architect technology solutions.
